channel.title: Steamcast (2 hour)
channel.description:
Steamcast recently held a podcast with Mike Hillard ( voice ), Kevin Sisk ( voice, scripting & choreo ), & Ben Truman ( story lead, scripting, & choreo ). Unfortunately, Steamcast is a bit behind on episodes but you can [url='https://www.twitch.tv/steamcast/b/291991707']listen on the unedited stream. ( skip to 14m )[/url]
[url='https://www.thesteamcast.com/']SteamCast[/url] [quote] Welcome to the official Steamcast website. Steamcast is a fan-made podcast, generally recorded on a weekly basis every Sunday, that hosts a wide range of gaming related topics. Contrary to its name, the podcast does not focus strictly on Valve or Steam related topics but aims to cover as much of the entire gaming industry as possible including gaming digital distribution, major gaming press conferences, and other relevant news. As a community-founded podcast, Steamcast places high importance on community participation. Members of the community are welcome to join the hosts and share their thoughts and opinions on specific topics. This gives the community — everyday gamers — the opportunity to voice their opinions and concerns..................... [/quote]

item.description:
Geek, you reek of Homer Stokes. (And if you are a true geek, you’ll get that reference.)

I hereby cast my vote for Comet. Huzzah!

item.title: Steamcast (2 hour)
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
CornetTheory:

We would have to form a special committee on the informing of Kevin Sisk “The Beer Fellow 007” Of the necessity in which the be sampled into it’s raw form, or in a form deemed appropriate, and placed on a [server] for the general public to consume herein [the forum].

Let it be known that I must be elected to this committee in order to carry out the demand previously stated.

I will do all of this, but also travel to rural farming districts and lift small pigs. Vote geekofalltrades!

Read full topic

item.title: Steamcast (2 hour)
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
That was a great interview. It really ups the feeling that BM is “coming”, even if that might not particularly be the case just yet. IMO one interview like this every once in a while is more worth it than constant updates every day, because it resparks my interest, whereas a constant thing just makes me loose interest after a while.

Read full topic

item.description:
Listened to the podcast today from Kane’s MP3 download. Simply glorious. Great work, VAs. The Gman was spot on. Even I can’t get it that good (And I’ve been told my Gman is pretty decent).

item.title: Steamcast (2 hour)
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
calhoun freeman:

We’ve been actively waiting for a mod (Duke nukem… we didn’t actually WAIT for that thing, did we?) for… 6 and a half years.

WTF is wrong with US.

[COLOR=‘Black’]Nothing, apparently, except that I caught a cold.

Considering I usually idle my free time away playing videogames anyway…

Read full topic

I did not push it for the hype.
I pushed because the loyal fans asked for it and you guys deserve it for sticking around.
